game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, fragments of the past and future collide in catastrophic events. Players take on the role of a skilled Temporal Archaeologist, tasked with unraveling the mysteries behind these temporal anomalies.
game.beginning: The game begins in the year 2157, where humanity has colonized other planets across the galaxy. The player's character is hired by the enigmatic organization known as 'The Order' to investigate strange occurrences that threaten the very fabric of space-time.
game.ending: As the player delves deeper into the mysteries of time, they will uncover a hidden truth behind the anomalies and face a final confrontation against the mastermind manipulating events. With their skills and knowledge, they must restore balance to the timestream and prevent an impending catastrophe.
